SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Class PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Datacenter
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerDatacenter
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware extends PowerDatacenter
PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware is a class that represents a non-power aware data center in the context of power-aware simulations.
If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper:
  • Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience (CCPE), Volume 24, Issue 13, Pages: 1397-1420, John Wiley invalid input: '&' Sons, Ltd, New York, USA, 2012
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov

  • Method Details

    • updateCloudletProcessing

      protected void updateCloudletProcessing()
      Description copied from class: Datacenter
      Updates processing of each cloudlet running in this Datacenter. It is necessary because Hosts and VirtualMachines are simple objects, not entities. So, they don't receive events and updating cloudlets inside them must be called from the outside.
      Overrides:
      updateCloudletProcessing in class PowerDatacenter
